review: Netflix does not work well at all.
author: Emla

review: Sleek fast and very easy to use. .  We love it. .
author: Veena Ramakrishnan

review: I'm really pleased with  the Fire Stick.  When I turn it on I'm very impressed with the picture.  Like sitting in the theatre.  Too many choices for me.  Only  have a few hours each evening.  Will continue to enjoy the Fire Stick!
author: Mary L. Meyer "freddy"

review: I like it especially the remote on my phone
author: paul d romano

review: Not so great. It begins to overheat after about an hour and begins to freeze for random periods. Pretty unacceptable overall. I returned mine. Try again Amazon.
author: N. Green

review: It is a bit slow and also interfere with my HDTV over the air signal.
author: D. Tran "green man"
